titleStmt.title: A sermon concerning the sacrifice and satisfaction of Christ. preached before the Queen at Whitehall, April 9., 1693.
titleStmt.author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.

notesStmt.note: Title page lacking on film; title from half t.p.
Attributed to John Tillotson by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
Includes bibliographical references in marginal notes.
